alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 24 at 10:03AM CDT until August 27 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. For the Pascagoula...including Collins, Near Hattiesburg, Hattiesburg, Laurel, Chunky, Arundel, Enterprise, Shubuta, Brooklyn...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek At Laurel. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to late Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Agricultural and lowland flooding is becoming more widespread along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 8.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 14.0 feet early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 8.7 Wed 9 am CDT 12.8 13.6 12.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at930 PM CDT.
